"

A Photo Manager

with 'A Photo Map' in 'AndroFotoFinder'
Features:
  • App and internet homepage available in these languages:
    • ar,  de,  en,  fr,  it,  ja,  nl, pl,  ro , ru tr
    • Help us to translate this app into other languages:
      • On a pc with keyboard and internet access through the crowdin.com website.
      • On android through the "A Photo Manager" menu Settings/Translate using the stringlate app.
  • Can handle big image collections (15000+ images in 1000+ folders)
  • Uses Android's image content provider. No initial image scan necessary.
  • Find images via
    • Quicksearch in Folder, Filename, Imagetitle, Imagedescription, Tags(Keywords) with wildcards (new in version 0.6.0)
    • folder (with hierarchical folder picker)
    • wildcards that match folder/filename
    • date
    • Included/Excluded Tags(Keywords) with wildcards (new in version 0.6.0)
    • area in geographic map (if image has GPS Exif info)
  • Shows result in a scrollable gallery view with
    • support for multiple photo selection
    • file operations Copy, Move, Delete, Share, Set Geo, Set Tags
  • Photo-detail-view with
    • image zoom
    • swipe to go to next/previous image
    • shows extended image info (Exif, IPTC, XMP, ICC)
    • file operations Copy, Move, Delete, Rename, Share, Set Geo, Set Tags
  • The geographic map shows markers at places where photos were taken
  • Changes in Photo-Metadata (Exif-Geo, Tags(Keywords), Path, Filename, ...) can be Synced between Android and MS Windows PC.(new in version 0.6.0)
  • File operations
    • will also update Android's image content provider database
    • update xmp-sidecar files

"
